Yet the garden of the [[Tulaytullah|city of sapphire]] has endured thanks to the protection of the white tree and the Ley Lines, and has now become a paradise for Fungi...}}
'''Garden of Endless Pillars''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located west of [[The Dune of Carouses]] in the [[Hypostyle Desert]], [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]]. There is only one level, '''Desert Vivarium'''.

==Unlock Guide==
There are five Pyro Monuments located around the domain entrance, with invisible barriers partially blocking them to require the player to move around while unlocking them. The order in which to unlock the Pyro Monuments is designated by the number of [[Flaming Flower]]s located next to it, from zero Flaming Flowers to four Flaming Flowers.
